actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for certain social security taxes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for the payment of social security taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for certain social security taxes.
